fields.label: Content box max width (%)
fields.name: content_box_max_width
fields.instructions: Note: The content box width can never be smaller than the longest word. This setting  does not apply to mobile devices, only to desktop and tablet.

fields.label: Content box visible while video plays
fields.name: content_box_visible_with_video
fields.instructions: Enable this to keep your text on top of a background video

fields.label: Enable portrait specific content box layout
fields.name: enable_portrait_content_box_layout

fields.label: Enable mobile specific content box layout
fields.name: enable_mobile_content_box_layout

fields.label: Content box border radius
fields.name: content_box_border_radius
fields.instructions:
CSS border radius format, eg. 10px 5px or 50%
Tip: Border radius still works with other border settings turned off.
